query.name: com.txoof.brightspace.students.usernames
query.description: export all active students grades 5-13 for use with a BrightSpace 7-User import
query.sql: select 'user' as "type", 'UPDATE' as "action", REGEXP_REPLACE(U_STUDENTSUSERFIELDS.EMAILSTUDENT, '(^.*)(@.*)', '\1') as "username", STUDENTS.ID as "org_defined_id", STUDENTS.FIRST_NAME as "first_name", STUDENTS.LAST_NAME as "last_name", '' as "password", 'Learner' as "role_name", '' as "relationships", '' as "pref_first_name", '' as "pref_last_name", U_STUDENTSUSERFIELDS.EMAILSTUDENT as "email", (CASE STUDENTS.ENROLL_STATUS WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) as "is_active" from STUDENTS STUDENTS, U_STUDENTSUSERFIELDS U_STUDENTSUSERFIELDS where STUDENTS.ENROLL_STATUS =0 and U_STUDENTSUSERFIELDS.STUDENTSDCID=STUDENTS.DCID and STUDENTS.GRADE_LEVEL >=5 order by STUDENTS.GRADE_LEVEL asc
